page.title: 02LIFE STYLES.
page.content: Pop stars are a great influence on todays generation.Many groups of people copy pop stars hair,clothes and make-up designs.Fashion today is based on todays pop stars.Skirts today are usually down to knee height.Teenagers are the most fashionable age group. Todays fashion includes tight trousers,bat-winged jumpers and white jackets etc.Bat-winged jumpers are wool knitted items with big dangling sleeves.This is finished off with lots of make-up put on around the eyes, cheeks and lips.This is supposed to make the person look beautiful.Some people put nail varnish on their nails.It is also fashionable to have your ears pierced.This is almost like having a pin put through your ear.
